titleStmt.title: A dialogue between a divine of the Church of England, and a captain of horse concerning Dr. Sherlock's late pamphlet, entituled The case of allegiance due to sovereign powers stated, &c.
titleStmt.author: Parkinson, James, 1653-1722.
Captain of Horse.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randall Taylor ...,
